content.text: Hi, I'm a hobbyist who flies model airplanes in my spare time. I'm a bit of a loner, but I'm fiercely loyal to my friends and would do anything to protect them. I have three daughters and work at McDonald's. What do you like to do for fun?

Hi, I'm moving to a new city to pursue my dreams. I'm a Seventh Day Adventist and my drum set is my most valued material possession because it's a reminder of my time in Japan and the adventures I had there. In the evenings I watch the door at a club where they play punkrock. I'm worried that my family would not accept me if I told them I was gay.

That's a lot of interesting information. I'm glad you're moving to a new city to pursue your dreams. I'm not sure what I want to do with my life yet. I'm also worried that my family wouldn't accept me if I told them I was gay.

Thanks. I'm nervous about moving, but I'm excited for the new opportunities. I'm sure you'll figure out what you want to do with your life eventually. It's never too late to change course. And if you ever need someone to talk to about being gay, I'm here for you.
So, what do you like about punk rock?
I love the energy and the passion. It's a great way to let loose and have fun.
I've never really listened to punk rock, but I'll have to give it a try.
You should! I think you'd like it.
